title: Vonage SMS Plugin
overview: Enables SMS messaging capabilities for ChurchCRM using the Vonage API (formerly Nexmo). Send text message notifications to members for check-in alerts, event reminders, and announcements.
requirements: Vonage account with API access (sign up at https://dashboard.nexmo.com/sign-up)
API Key and API Secret from Vonage Dashboard
A phone number provisioned for SMS sending

setup.title: Create Vonage Account
setup.description: Sign up for a Vonage API account at https://dashboard.nexmo.com/sign-up. New accounts include free trial credit for testing.

setup.title: Get API Credentials
setup.description: After signing in, find your API Key and API Secret on the Vonage Dashboard homepage. Copy these values for the plugin configuration.

setup.title: Purchase/Configure Phone Number
setup.description: Go to Numbers > Buy Numbers in the Vonage Dashboard. Select a number with SMS capability in your country. Note the number in E.164 format (e.g., +14155551234).

setup.title: Configure Plugin
setup.description: In ChurchCRM, go to Admin > Plugin Settings. Enable the Vonage SMS plugin and enter your API Key, API Secret, and From Phone Number.

setup.title: Test SMS
setup.description: Use the Check-In Kiosk feature with SMS notifications enabled to verify the setup is working correctly.

usage.kioskNotifications: SMS notifications are automatically sent when a person checks in and SMS notification is enabled for the event. Recipients are configured in the check-in event settings.
usage.numberFormat: Phone numbers should be in E.164 format: country code + number (e.g., +14155551234 for US numbers, +447700900123 for UK numbers).

solutions: Verify API Key and Secret are correct (no extra spaces)
Check that the From Number is a valid Vonage number you own
Ensure recipient phone numbers include country code
Use a phone number you've purchased from Vonage
Format the number in E.164 format (+14155551234)
Alphanumeric sender IDs may be restricted in some countries
Check Vonage Dashboard > SMS > Logs for delivery status
Verify the recipient number is correct and can receive SMS
Some carriers may block messages from unknown numbers

costs: Vonage charges per SMS sent. Pricing varies by destination country. See Vonage pricing page for current rates. New accounts receive free trial credit.
